thread.title: Who is the mystery character of Ring Road?
thread.title_full: Who is the mystery character of Ring Road? - The Times of India

author: Dhwani Desai
title: Who is the mystery character of Ring Road?
text:
Priya Belliappa's Ring Road, which releases this week, has a host of actors â€” some new, while the others are established actors of Sandalwood. When asked why she chose to have so many actors on board, the director says that the screenplay was structured in such a way that if she didn't have so many characters, it would all fall flat. "The film has many facets that are woven into the screenplay. I needed actors with recall value, as I wanted substance and presence to come with their characters," says Priya.
The movie has 13 main actors, apart from a mystery character, who the makers have been tightlipped about. "The 14th character is a mystery that no one knows about. The person will only be revealed when Ring Road hits theatres. The character is vital to the movie and will be one of the high points of the film," says Priya.
